description: Execute an openCypher query. When invoking this operation in a Neptune Analytics cluster, the IAM user or role making the request must have a policy attached that allows one of the following IAM actions in that cluster, depending on the query:

parameters.name: graphIdentifier
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the Neptune Analytics graph.

parameters.name: queryString
parameters.description: The query string to be executed.

parameters.name: language
parameters.description: The query language the query is written in. Currently only openCypher is supported.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: The data parameters the query can use in JSON format. For example: {'name': 'john', 'age': 20}. (optional) (string) --- (document) ---
